text: Need Joshua Hall for Qantas campaign. Budget around $16,941, looking for 2 x TikTok video, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x Product photography, 3 x Lifestyle photography. 11 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
